content: What if I want to be the ‘Best Idea Machine’ I can be instead of a ‘Goddamn Idea Machine’? The body of your article is very good and your enthusiasm is contagious, but the article’s title is off-putting to many people and IMO not the best idea. I don’t know who wrote the title, you or an editor, but it would have been a good idea to ask a more positive rhetorical question of your readers. But again, the advice and enthusiasm are good. Have a great day.
